@DeltaAssist Thank you! It was surprising to receive this treatment- I looked for help from others at same counter and no one offered.
@DeltaAssist It's all about your people!
@DeltaAssist and she was in no rush to help me. The downstairs agent, German, could not have been nicer and more helpful!
@DeltaAssist the problem is she was rude, intransigent even tho I apologized for being late before she said she couldn't chk my bags.
@DeltaAssist but it probably would given shuttle and thanked me for my loyalty. Sent me on my way. I had 10 mins to stand + wait b4 boarding
@DeltaAssist got there and the man was helping another late bag but helped as fast as possible, said was chance bags wouldn't make it
@DeltaAssist She said she had new manager and would be audited. I asked my sky cap about downstairs shuttle check in and we ran!
@DeltaAssist I told her my situation - mtg in Nyc at 5:30, had had to run back home after forgetting some things.
@DeltaAssist she took another 3 mins to say she would not be putting my bags in, but rebooking me on the next flight
@DeltaAssist sorry 2:19
@DeltaAssist thank you. I arrived outside at 2:15 guys outside said the system was closed so we ran inside with my bags, I arrived at 2:14
Horrible treatmt by 1 @Delta agent (main bag chk counter at DCA) saved by wonderful treatment by other (downstairs shuttle chk) @DeltaAssist
